name: Time.Loop()
description:
Created as part of the One Script Jam

In this portal inspired logic-puzzle game you only have 10 seconds to make your move... and then repeat. In this game you have an unlimited number of 10 seconds lives where the actions of your previous lives play out before your eyes and help you reach your goal.

----

 Solve puzzles that are a combination of pressure pads, buttons and platforms to make your way to the end.

Pick up coins for an added 10 second bonus to give you those last precious seconds you need.

----

Meet the Team

Jacob - Programmer / Team Leader

Brandon - Level Design

Nadyne - Level Design
